comments.creator: nicolas.barbulesco@supinfo.com
comments.author: nicolas.barbulesco@supinfo.com
comments.text:
Hello,

Firefox 5.0. Mac OS X 10.6.8.

I paste text in the address bar. I click on the menu Tools. The menu must show ; it does not. I click again. Now the menu shows.

I made a screen film :
http://screencast.com/t/gzf9FwAJ

Thanks for fixing that bug.

Nicolas
comments.raw_text:
Hello,

Firefox 5.0. Mac OS X 10.6.8.

I paste text in the address bar. I click on the menu Tools. The menu must show ; it does not. I click again. Now the menu shows.

I made a screen film :
http://screencast.com/t/gzf9FwAJ

Thanks for fixing that bug.

Nicolas
